executable.title: Segment Lung Airways
executable.description: This program segments the airways starting from a chest CT image. \ To create a list of fiducials, click on the tool bar icon of an arrow pointing to a \ starburst fiducial to enter the 'place a new object mode' and then use the fiducials \ module.
